lyrics.input: anytime i need to see your face
I am taken to a place
lyrics.reply: Where your crystal minds and magenta feelings take up shelter in the base of my spine, sweet like a chic-a-cherry cola.

lyrics.input: where your crystal minds and magenta feelings
lyrics.reply: Take up shelter in the base of my spine, sweet like a chic-a-cherry cola.

lyrics.input: take up shelter in the base of my spine
every time i close my eyes
lyrics.reply: I wake up feeling so horny.

lyrics.input: i can't get you outta my mind
lyrics.reply: Sexin' you be all I see.
Just to make you understand me.

lyrics.input: i don't give a damn about nothing else
lyrics.reply: Freek'n you is all I need.
